p: Progression with this project provided clear indications that interested countries should allocate appropriate resources into a functioning and high-quality electronic surveillance system that can allow detection and response to outbreaks at early stages [ 24]. Furthermore and against the background of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), which will involve major investments in health by many countries, robust indicators for tracking health systemsâ€™ effectiveness will be critical. EWARS-R is therefore, an example of a tool able to contribute directly to that process.
